Bowen Craggs & Co is a unique research and consultancy group. Our sole focus is online corporate communications - websites, social media and apps.

column11: Bowen Craggs & Co helps large organisations maximise the effectiveness of their websites and other online tools, using techniques that we have refined over the past 15 years. Our goal is to help them close the gap between what they are doing online and what they could be doing.

We start from the belief that an effective web presence should be aligned with business goals and visitors’ needs. We then help clients bring these closer together through internal, external and expert views that combine deep analysis with actionable recommendations.
